Title: Special Correspondents
Writer: Simon Michaël (adaptation), Simon Michaël (dialogue), Simon Michaël (scenario), Jacques Labib (adaptation), Jacques Labib (dialogue), Jacques Labib (scenario), Simon Michaël (original idea), Jacques Labib (original idea)
Actors: Gérard Jugnot, Gérard Lanvin, Omar Sy, Valérie Kaprisky
Plot: France mobilizes to gain the release of two kidnapped journalists in Iraq, but only the victims know the crime has been faked.
